title: Dont trust ppl..
body:
[8:33] Top Or Feeding: hey man was wondering if u had any rp looking for someone to trade a mystery gift with
i mean, we will exchange?
that is the plan haha.                                              TO make it short he just removed me after he got the gift sad World we live in very sad...

replies.body:
''Hey trust me I'm from internet.''

Never ever trust a stranger!
wow... last time i got scammed in a videogame i was like 12 playing runescape.

Not really much sadder than the world we lived in through out history. If you had been living in deep German country right now a band of thieves would ask for some awesome trade. But in reality they are just going to take all your stuff, then kill you on top of that. Be happy you live in a world where you only lose a few bucks..

But his name is Top or Feeding.

Why you trust a toxic person, or someone with a toxic name at least :C
Shouldn't be trusting people unless they are close to you, even then there's a risk, but some people wouldn't give up friendship for a few dollars.
